general_info.summary: This text lists several professional and academic regulatory bodies in India, including the Bar Council of India, Council of Architecture, Indian Association of Physiotherapists, Indian Nursing Council, Pharmacy Council of India, and Association of Indian Universities.
general_info.raw_content:
BAR COUNCIL OF INDIA
Council of Architecture
Indian Association of Physiotherapists
Indian Nursing Council
Pharmacy Council of India
Association of Indian Universities

admission_requirements.summary: To be eligible for this program, candidates must have completed 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics or Biology, achieving a minimum of 50% marks from an accredited educational board, or alternatively, be selected through the UNIVERSITY ENTRANCE TEST NIU counselling process.
admission_requirements.raw_content: â€¢ Eligibility: 10+2 with PCM/PCB Subjects minimum 50% marks from a recognized education board or through counselling from UNIVERSITY ENTRANCE TEST NIU.
